title: South Korea’s People Power Party seeks further delay in cryptocurrency taxation
description: South Korea’s political landscape is witnessing a pivotal moment as the ruling People Power Party (PPP) pushes for an additional two-year postponement of taxation on cryptocurrency investment gains.
